Kinshuk Debnath (; born 8 May 1985) is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Bhawanipore FC.
Honours
Club
;Mohun Bagan
*I-League: 2014–15
*Federation Cup: 2015–16
;Atlético de Kolkata
*Indian Super League: 2014, 2016
